ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Ready For Approval") && ( ISNULL( Shipping_Cost__c ) || ISNULL( Demo_Unit__c ) || ISNULL( Install_Date__c ) || ISNULL( Shipping_Date__c ) || ISNULL( Removal_Date__c ) || ISNULL( Shipping_Address__c ) || ISNULL( Primary_Contact__c ) || ISPICKVAL(Financial_Responsibility__c,"" ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can't go for approval with missing fields
